```{r}
library(yfR)
```

```{r}
# P1: Stock price data
tickers <- c("PFE", "AZN", "JNJ", "MRNA", "1099.HK", "SVA", "NVAX", "6185.HK", "CASBF", "302440.KS")
first_date <- "2015-01-30"
last_date <- Sys.Date() # 7 Sep 2025
cache_folder <- "../data"

df_yf <- yf_get(
  tickers = tickers,
  first_date = first_date,
  last_date = last_date,
  thresh_bad_data = 0,
  freq_data = "daily",
  do_complete_data = TRUE,
  do_cache = TRUE,
  cache_folder = cache_folder
)

print(df_yf)
```
